com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageLoader.ImageContainer

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.LinkedList<ImageLoader.ImageContainer> ImageLoader.BatchedImageRequest.mContainers
      List of all of the active ImageContainers that are interested in the request
      Methods in com.android.volley.toolbox that return ImageLoader.ImageContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageLoader.ImageContainer ImageLoader.get(java.lang.String requestUrl, ImageLoader.ImageListener listener)
      Returns an ImageContainer for the requested URL.
      ImageLoader.ImageContainer ImageLoader.get(java.lang.String requestUrl, ImageLoader.ImageListener imageListener, int maxWidth, int maxHeight)
      Equivalent to calling ImageLoader.get(String, ImageListener, int, int, ScaleType) with Scaletype == ScaleType.CENTER_INSIDE.
      ImageLoader.ImageContainer ImageLoader.get(java.lang.String requestUrl, ImageLoader.ImageListener imageListener, int maxWidth, int maxHeight, ScaleType scaleType)
      Issues a bitmap request with the given URL if that image is not available in the cache, and returns a bitmap container that contains all of the data relating to the request (as well as the default image if the requested image is not available).
      Methods in com.android.volley.toolbox with parameters of type ImageLoader.ImageContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImageLoader.BatchedImageRequest.addContainer(ImageLoader.ImageContainer container)
      Adds another ImageContainer to the list of those interested in the results of the request.
      void ImageLoader.ImageListener.onResponse(ImageLoader.ImageContainer response, boolean isImmediate)
      Listens for non-error changes to the loading of the image request.
      boolean ImageLoader.BatchedImageRequest.removeContainerAndCancelIfNecessary(ImageLoader.ImageContainer container)
      Detatches the bitmap container from the request and cancels the request if no one is left listening.
      Constructors in com.android.volley.toolbox with parameters of type ImageLoader.ImageContainer 
      Constructor and Description
      BatchedImageRequest(Request<?> request, ImageLoader.ImageContainer container)
      Constructs a new BatchedImageRequest object
